title: Bonus Episode: 30 Years of Life, Money, & Hope on The Ramsey Show
description:
In this special bonus episode celebrating the 30th anniversary of the Ramsey Show, Dave and the personalities take a look back at 30 years of the show. They talk about the best and worst calls, the heart behind the show, and where they see the show going in the next 30 years. It's a special episode filled with stories from THREE DECADES of amazing people doing amazing things to change their lives and live like no one else.
Watch this episode on YouTube here: https://youtu.be/2LJoOlhZ4Ak
